name: Tic Tac Toe - Tris
description:
Hello, this is my first game. 
This is the classic Tic Tac Toe known also like Tris . In this game you have to put three same symbols in a row (horizontally or vertically or obliquely). It is very simple, but at the same time it is a bit difficult)  and you can play it versus the pc (AI mode) or versus your friends (2P mode). I’ve added some features like settings, shops, skins and scores. The system saves the counting of the money so if you quit you don't lose your progresses.

If you will find a bug please leave a comment and I will try to fix it as soon as possible.

Please leave a review of the game and your experience. Your review will be useful for me because, in the future, I would like to get better than now at game programming.

I hope that you will enjoy it. Good game to you and to your friends.
